meanings.definition: A device for projecting images onto a screen.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used the epidiascope to show us pictures of animals.
meanings.sent2: The epidiascope displayed colorful images during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: At the party, they tried to use the epidiascope to project funny faces on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an epidiascope, projecting memories vividly onto the screen of her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The epidiascope illuminated the dark room with a burst of light and pictures.

meanings.definition: To project images using an epidiascope.
meanings.sent1: We will epidiascope the photos from our trip for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: She epidiascopeed the slides effortlessly, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to epidiascope a rabbit onto the screen but got a carrot instead.
meanings.sent4: His words epidiascopeed a vision of hope and unity to all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The artist epidiascopeed his emotions onto the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
